name: Schafs the game
description:
Fixed Crash bug

This is the most game I've ever made. First time using unity btw

Alright I know that I'm making a serious game Noclipped right now and posting this game might ruin my reputation as a great gamedev.

However I made this game just because someone at the ILL (Impossible Level List) wanted a schafs game and I just made it.

Game made in unity in 2 days. All memes from ILL

Thanks to Ewe for allowing this """masterpiece""" to exist

I hope this joke doesn't ruin my portfo
